CIMPLR - Building Biasmaps
========================================================


```{r}
# Build background bed file


library(Biobase)
library(BSgenome.Mmusculus.UCSC.mm9)
library(GenomicFeatures)
library(rjson)
library(multicore)
library(rtracklayer)

source('lib/core.R')
source('lib/biasmaps.R')


scales <- log.seq(5000, 500000, 100)
#scales <- 30000

references.dir <- 'references'


reference  <- buildReferences(
  pattern = 'TA',
	bsgenome = get('Mmusculus'),
	chromosomes = seqnames(Mmusculus)[1:21],
	scales = scales,
	n.cores=c(scales=1,chromosome=1),
	output.dir = references.dir
)
```
